name: Semantic Classifier Operator
intent: Realize Φ as a semantic classification map from deviations into equivalence classes and then into representations.

signature.mapping: Φ\_class \= Φ ∘ π where π: D \-\> D/\~

algebraic\_properties: π: D \-\> D/\~ is a quotient map with fibers equal to semantic equivalence classes.
constraints: For any two meaningful deviations d, d', if Φ\_class(d) \= Φ\_class(d') then they lie in the same semantic class.
The composition δ \-\> Φ\_class must preserve meaningfulness as defined in Chapter 1.
